name: Google
description: Google offers a comprehensive set of core integration tools to connect & manage the multitude operation.

name: Mailchimp
description: Manually connect your website to Mailchimp, or add our code to a website builder, and you can add.

name: Discord
description: Discord integration allows users to send form responses to a shared discord channel.

name: LinkedIn
description: Automatically pull info from Twitter, WordPress, and other apps to post company updates or share a post.

name: Zapier
description: Zapier is an online automation tool that connects your apps & service. You can connect two or more app.

name: Slack
description: Slack integrations are variants of a tool or product that are directly accessible via Slack.

name: Facebook
description: Facebook integration is connection between and a Facebook app or product and another external app.

name: Twitter
description: Twitter allows access to part of our service via APIs to allow people to build software that integrate.

name: Youtube
description: YouTube is a video sharing platform allowing user to upload, view, share, add to playlist, comment.
